General.Name: Netz Hotels Ltd
General.Description: Netz Hotels Ltd owns and manages hotels in Israel. It operates seven hotels with 2000 rooms under the Crowne Plaza and Holiday Inn brands. The company was formerly known as Amalya L.B. Holdings Ltd and changed its name to Netz Hotels Ltd in July 2012. Netz Hotels Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. As of December 6, 2017, Netz Hotels Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Amos Luzon Development and Energy Group Ltd.
